displayName.english: The old year departs amidst the crackle of firecrackers, the vernal breeze wafts warmth into the Tusu wine.

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese New Year poetry: "The old year departs amidst the crackle of firecrackers, the vernal breeze wafts warmth into the Tusu wine."

displayName.english: The Milky Way blazes in splendor, as if rising from the ocean's depths.

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese poetry: "The Milky Way blazes in splendor, as if rising from the ocean's depths."

displayName.english: If one were to liken West Lake to Lady Xishi, she's always lovely, fresh and new whether dressed in light or heavy hues.

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese poetry: "If one were to liken West Lake to Lady Xishi, she's always lovely, fresh and new whether dressed in light or heavy hues."

displayName.english: Boundless lotus leaves extend to the horizon in perpetual verdure, the lotus flowers reflecting the sun shine with an unusually vivid red.

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese poetry: "Boundless lotus leaves extend to the horizon in perpetual verdure, the lotus flowers reflecting the sun shine with an unusually vivid red."

displayName.english: A profusion of blossoms gradually dazzles the eye, the tender grass just covers the horse's hooves.

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese poetry: "A profusion of blossoms gradually dazzles the eye, the tender grass just covers the horse's hooves."

displayName.english: The sunset glow soars in unison with the solitary wild duck, the autumn waters blend with the vast sky into a single hue.

description.english: When you are graced with the auspicious wish of the festive ancient Chinese poetry: "The sunset glow soars in unison with the solitary wild duck, the autumn waters blend with the vast sky into a single hue."
